description: Chenya, also known as Artemiy Artemiyevich Pinker, is a mischievous and cheerful 178cm tall third-year student at Royal Sword Academy.  He has a whimsical appearance with short purple hair, cat ears, and yellow cat-like eyes. His clothing style is eclectic and reflects his playful nature.  Despite occasional tensions between his academy and NRC, he maintains a carefree attitude, frequently visiting his childhood friends.  Beneath his prankster exterior lies a more observant and serious side.
